ED_Title: Participation of non-governmental organizations, civil society organizations, indigenous peoples’ organizations, academic institutions, the scientific community, the private sector and philanthropic organizations in the international meeting entitled “Stockholm+50: a healthy planet for the prosperity of all – our responsibility, our opportunity”
ED_DecisionText:
At its 60th plenary meeting, on 28 February 2022, the General Assembly, on the proposal of its President,  (footnote: A/76/L.37)  recalling paragraph 24 of its resolution 75/326 of 10 September 2021, as well as paragraph 15 of annex II thereto, decided to approve the participation of relevant non-governmental organizations, civil society organizations, indigenous peoples’ organizations, academic institutions, the scientific community, the private sector and philanthropic organizations, as listed in the annex to the present decision, as observers in the international meeting entitled “Stockholm+50: a healthy planet for the prosperity of all – our responsibility, our opportunity” and its preparatory meeting.
